text: Ani anekesvaravadi mhanale, jara allahane icchile asate tara amhi ani amace vadavadila tyacyakherija dusaryace upasaka jhale nasate, na tyacya hukumavina ekhadya vastula harama (avaidha) tharavile asate. Heca acarana tyancya purvicya lokancehi rahile, tevha paigambaranci jababadari kevala spasta sandesa pohacavinyaci ahe
